title: Ticket #1010: HAD name includes arguments
description:
First noticed, 

4/1 14:13:55 Adding to resolved authorization table: condor/10.16.44.234: DAEMON

4/1 14:13:55 HadAd  : Inserting ** "< condor@nodeX.lab.bos.redhat.com -p 51450 >
"
4/1 14:13:55 stats: Inserting new hashent for 'HAD':'condor@nodeX.lab.bos.redhat
.com -p 51450':'10.16.44.234'

Still funny, 

12:53:20pm> chopin:~ $ condor_status -any | grep -e HAD -e MyType
MyType               TargetType           Name
HAD                  None                 condor@astro.cs.wisc.edu -p 51
HAD                  None                 condor@chopin.cs.wisc.edu -p 5
HAD                  None                 condor@tonic.cs.wisc.edu -p 51
